server.facade

Class ServerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.facade.ServerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IServer

    public class ServerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServer
    Catan Server Facade that gets called by commands

        JoinExceptions

      • rollNumber

        public java.lang.String rollNumber(int number)
        Roll Number applies a roll of the dice to the model
        Specified by:
        rollNumber in interface IServer
        Pre-Conditions
        the active player rolled the dice. The number is between 2 and 12
        Post-Conditions
        everybody gets their resources and discarding and robbing are triggered on a 7 roll
